scripts.init: npm run init:packages && npm run init:examples
scripts.build:packages: npm run init:packages && lerna exec --parallel -- babel --root-mode upward index.js -d dist
scripts.build:examples: npm run init:examples && cd examples && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:examples
scripts.dev:packages: lerna exec --parallel -- babel -w --root-mode upward index.js -d dist
scripts.dev: npm run bootstrap && concurrently "npm run dev:packages" "npm run dev:examples"
